greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A discrete version of the Mangoldt function: if n is prime then ceiling(log(n)) else 0.
comment: The real Mangoldt function Lambda(n) is equal to log(n) if n is prime else 0.
reference: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976, page 32.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65539
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
